text: day two of the standoff here at Budapest
East Station thousands of people camped
out sleeping on the pavement on the
sidewalks around this railway station
people are very tired
people are very desperate they say
they've been lied to by the authorities
many of them bought tickets to travel on
to Western Europe but the reason they
cannot travel on is the line of police
along the steps of the railway station
there they're preventing people getting
onto the trains even though many of the
people do have tickets there so the
people say they're determined to stay
here until they can get onto the trains
people very desperate then let's have a
look at the situation now beneath the
railway station in some of the under
passes here where people have been
camped out not only for days but even
for weeks remarkable scenes then in the
under passes below buda-pesth
East station children playing for them
something of an adventure this other
people just resting sleeping trying to
endure this it's hard to see how long
this situation will be tolerated by the
Hungarian authorities we know there are
plans to move people from here to a more
permanent so-called transit zone above
ground just behind the railway station
but it would be very hard for the police
to move people up there and we don't
know how the crowd would react so for
now the stalemate here at beautiful
station continued
